PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-08642016-10-07TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Vessel Operation Restriction Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the VESSEL OPERATION RESTRICTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) enhance the safety of navigation, both commercial and recreational, by restricting or prohibiting the type of vessel and speed of the vessel, thus resolving the conflicts between waterway users that give rise to safety risks; and (2) minimize threats to the ecosystem of the Columbia River (Columbia Wetlands complex) in south-eastern of British Columbia, caused by the operation of power-driven vessels.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0268 Publication Date: 2016-10-19
AttachmentsAttachment
